207.name: Only Zuhl
207.description: Plumb the depths of Sector Zuhl.

220.name: Crash Landing
220.requirement: Find the wrong place to stand during a Claw of Jormag fight.

567.name: Monthly PvP Completionist
567.description: You completed your PvP daily category multiple times in a month.
567.requirement: Complete the PvP daily category  time.

624.name: Southsun Stalwart
624.description: Successfully complete all of the Southsun achievements.

736.name: Kiel Every Day
736.description: In every way. Go, Captain Ellen Kiel!
736.requirement: Complete daily achievements while supporting Ellen Kiel.

797.name: Pirate Punisher
797.requirement: Complete the second tier of the Queen's Gauntlet.

799.name: Candle in the Wind
799.requirement: Defeat Windcaller Kieldia with On Fire gambit active.

836.name: Invasion Canceler
836.requirement: Completely stop one of Scarlet's portal attacks in Gendarran Fields.

1085.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1085.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1590.name: Sky Crystal Seeker
1590.requirement: Locate  sky crystal in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

1772.name: Shut the Doors
1772.requirement: Complete  door event in Mad King's Labyrinth.

1862.name: Daily Necromancer Winner
1862.requirement: Win  PvP match as a necromancer.

1872.name: Daily The Long Way Around Minidungeon
1872.requirement: Complete the The Long Way Around minidungeon in Straits of Devastation.

1892.name: Daily Collapsed Observatory Jumping Puzzle
1892.requirement: Complete the Collapsed Observatory jumping puzzle in Kessex Hills.

1901.name: Daily Hidden Garden Jumping Puzzle
1901.requirement: Complete the Hidden Garden jumping puzzle in Mount Maelstrom.

1961.name: Daily Malchor's Leap Event Completer
1961.requirement: Complete events in Malchor's Leap in Orr.

2262.name: Auric Weapons
2262.requirement: Unlock all  Auric weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2295.name: Legendary Backpack: Ad Infinitum
2295.description: Unlock all 13 fractal tier 4 components to work towards building the legendary fractal backpack.
2295.locked_text: Complete Ad Infinitum III, then talk to Kelvei in the Fractals of the Mists.

2300.name: Machined Greatsword
2300.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Greatsword.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2318.name: Casual-Fractal Hero
2318.requirement: Complete each fractal scale from 1 to 20.

Fractal Scale 2

2350.name: Shooting Gallery: Silver
2350.requirement: Shoot as many target dummies as you can before time runs out!

2452.name: Ydalir
2452.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the dragonhunter's bow, Ydalir.
2452.locked_text: Begin training the guardian's dragonhunter elite specialization.

bits.text: Created in the Mystic Forge.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Completely unlock the elite specialization.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2481.name: The Dreamer I: The Experimental Short Bow
2481.description: The heart hunts on a lonely train, plagued by desire, sadness, and occasionally joy. It pervades Tyria and its people. Track down these moments of the heart throughout the land in your first steps to create the legendary precursor The Lover.
2481.locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Find the letter meant for Dessa in the Raving Asura's chest in the Uncategorized Fractal, and bring it to Dessa.
Find a rare cactus flower while harvesting cactus in the Maguuma Wastes and bring it to Ikkhit'ch's friend, the Seraph Archer in Camp Resolve.

Purchase a Stein of Ancient Deldrimor Ale from Arcanist Vance in the ruins of the Granite Citadel in Dredgehaunt Cliffs after helping him study the Dwarven relics. Then bring it to Ogden Stonehealer in the Durmand Priory.
Bring a red iris flower picked from the Urban Battlegrounds Fractal to the grave of Gwen Thackeray in Ebonhawke.
Purchased from Wark after rescuing him from the infatuated harpy matriarch.
Bring the Skritt King a shiny orb harvested from the large glowing orb at the Wreck of the Golden Vanity in Cursed Shore.
Found in the chest in the Underground Facility Fractal.
Found in the chest in the Cliffside Fractal.
Found in the Spekk's Lab chest in Caledon Forest.
Dropped by enemies guarding their gardens.
Dropped by Otyugh in Fields of Ruin.
Give a black pearl, dropped by the risen in Orr, to Peneloopee in Lion's Arch.
Read about the quaggan love potion in the Durmand Priory.
Bow to the Sculptor's Memorial in Malchor's Leap out of respect for his great love.

2596.name: Rodgort II: The Perfected Torch
2596.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Rodgort's Flame has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secret to weighting a torch head.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a torch handle.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.

Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2610.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Lover has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.

Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of superior woodworking tools.

Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2748.name: League Rank Earner—Champion
2748.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2748.requirement: Obtain 80,000 rank points from playing ranked matches.

2768.name: Winter's Presence
2768.requirement: Collect all  items to create Winter's Presence.
2768.locked_text: Purchase a blueprint for Winter's Presence from a Wintersday vendor.

bits.text: Created with snowflakes in the Mystic Forge.
Created with snowflakes in the Mystic Forge.
Created with snowflakes in the Mystic Forge.

Chest 2

2920.description: "Under Bagred's tutelage, I now undertake my hunt. These pages will chronicle the greatness of my deed."
2920.locked_text: Speak with Bagred the Hunter near Hrothgar's Pass in Snowden Drifts.

bits.text: Speak with Bagred the Hunter in Snowden Drifts to learn to craft a book that Bagred can use to create a hunter's journal.

2999.name: Long Arm of the Light
2999.requirement: Defeat bandit leaders marshaling in the shadows.

bits.text: Vic the Iron
Zirh the Venomous
Ruye the Crimson
Flyrra the Remorseless
Aerl the Silent

3020.name: Stay of Execution
3020.requirement: Collect an Executioner's Coin Purse from a Bandit Executioner.

3038.name: Daily Tier 4 Chaos
3038.requirement: Complete Chaos at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3126.name: Queen of the Fire Islands
3126.requirement: Knock some sense into the circus sloth near Performance Field.

3338.name: Shadow in the Shadows
3338.description: Story Instance: A Meeting of Ministers
3338.requirement: Find Queen Jennah's escaped cat, Shadow.

3360.name: Mindfulness
3360.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that completes a meditation and wins the match in rated Temple of the Silent Storm  time.

3518.name: Storyteller: Balthazar
3518.requirement: Find all the pages of the Parable of Balthazar.

bits.text: Seek those who bring life near Balthazar.
Where the wall towers above the queen.
Where the lava flows, upward you must go.
By where fire meets illusion.
By where the vein bleeds.
By the base of the arm, near what is broken and wildly worn.

3865.name: Domain of Vabbi Explorer
3865.description: You've explored the fabled opulence of the Domain of Vabbi.
3865.requirement: Explore all the areas in the Domain of Vabbi.

bits.text: Vehtendi Academy
Vehtendi Arena
Grand Court of Sebelkeh
Cragged Vale
Dehwan Expanse

3879.name: Lurking among the Flames
3879.requirement: Get through the Forged camps without the sentries setting off any alarms.

3881.name: Recitation of the Litany of Deeds
3881.description: <c=@Flavor>It was customary for heralds and traveling performers to gather and compete over who could tell the most impressive tales to assembled guests and foreign dignitaries.</c>
3881.requirement: Bring  tales of your adventures to the Elisa, the traveler.

bits.text: Assist a group of ogres seeking aid at the Tomb of Primeval Kings.
Trade a Tale of Loyalty with Priory Historian Elisa. Elisa travels to a different map in the desert each week.
Protect Amnoon Water Authority and those who maintain it when they are under attack.
Trade a Tale of Plenty with Priory Historian Elisa. Elisa travels to a different map in the desert each week.
Stop the Mordant Graveraiser from defiling graves in Elon Riverlands.
Trade a Tale of Dignity with Priory Historian Elisa. Elisa travels to a different map in the desert each week.
Use junundu wurms to destroy the siege forces in the Shattered Ravine.
Trade a Tale of Courage with Priory Historian Elisa. Elisa travels to a different map in the desert each week.
Defend Elonians from the whims of the High Judges in the Court of the Dead.
Trade a Tale of Judgment with Priory Historian Elisa. Elisa travels to a different map in the desert each week.

3921.name: Champion of the Labyrinth
3921.requirement: Defeat bosses in the Mad King's Labyrinth.

4117.name: Honorary Olmakhan
4117.requirement: Defeat each of the prestige hunting targets in the hunting grounds.

bits.text: Tufani
Ilani
Skaa
Ubaya
Feesi

4129.name: Inquest.Info
4129.requirement: Found all the classified Inquest data in Rata Primus.

4134.name: Sandswept Isles Insight: Rata Primus
4134.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Sandswept Isles.

4323.name: Boss Blitz: Wallop Wiggin
4323.requirement: Defeat Wiggin the Wicked during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion.

4339.name: Equinox Weapon Collection
4339.requirement: Unlock all Equinox weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4340.name: Mini Springer Kit Collection
4340.requirement: Unlock all mini springer kits in your wardrobe.

4349.name: Matchmaker, Matchmaker
4349.description: Sometimes the best weapon really is friendship.
4349.requirement: Start 15 successful conversations in a row between factions in the Chantry.

4537.name: Channel the Creator
4537.requirement: Complete a fractal with an ArenaNet employee.

4641.name: Fatal Fangs
4641.requirement: Use Superior Battle Maul to strike players who are in a downed state.

4792.name: Dame of the Arena
4792.requirement: Finish the season in 101st–250th on the skill rating leaderboard.

4891.name: Bonus Event: Daily Champion Rush—Orr
4891.requirement: Defeat a champion-rank enemy in the Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, or the Cursed Shore.

4908.name: Cub Consoler
4908.description: Make sure all the Flame Legion cubs feel okay.

5045.name: Daily Bjora Marches Treasure Hunter
5045.requirement: Open hidden chests spread throughout Bjora Marches.

5354.name: Special Mission: Cut Off Their Heads
5354.requirement: Defeat  Dominion tribunes in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.
5354.locked_text: Unlock by using Dominion Intel Documents.

5357.name: Drizzlewood Historian
5357.requirement: Find all hidden history books around Drizzlewood Coast.

bits.text: A Brief Reflection on Olaf Olafson
Norn/Human Diplomacy
The Legacy and Mythos of the Olafson Sword
The Great Drunken Debauchery of Sven Liefson
The Betrayal of Olaf Olafson

5383.name: Confer with Bangar
5383.description: Even in his captivity, Bangar is shrewd enough not to share all of his thoughts at once. I need to wait until the right time to get information from him.
5383.requirement: Speak with Bangar Ruinbringer at the Eye of the North.

bits.text: Check in with Bangar at the Eye of the North.
Bangar's rebuke.
Bangar's ego.
Rytlock speaks his mind.
Aurene versus Jormag.
Jormag's secret.
Crecia weighs in.
Jormag's enemy.

5467.name: League Slayer—3v3 Season Two
5467.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 3v3 Season Two.

5731.name: Ore Miner: Dry Top
5731.requirement: Mine ore  times in Dry Top.

5769.name: Return to Into the Labyrinth
5769.requirement: Complete the mission Into the Labyrinth in Living World Season 2 Episode 6.

5967.name: Second Response: Brisban Wildlands
5967.requirement: Complete the Brisban Wildlands Dragon Response Mission.

5993.name: Woodland Management: Drizzlewood Coast
5993.requirement: Log wood  times in Drizzlewood Coast.

6074.name: Tracing the Tapestry
6074.description: "That was the day the Ministry of Purity attacked. We said our good-byes, and then scattered across Tyria to preserve the bloodline."—Countess Danika zu Heltzer
6074.requirement: Find the missing pieces of the zu Heltzer tapestry, spread across Tyria.

bits.text: Someone in Lion's Arch of Canthan descent may know more.
There could be something hidden in the depths of the Durmand Priory.
There may be tengu outside the Dominion of Winds who could help.
It could be worth pursuing rumors of lost wreckage in the waters surrounding Seitung Province.
An official in New Kaineng City's Lutgardis Plaza might be able to help you.
The site of an ancient battle in Echovald Wilds might be worth investigating, if you can get in.
Proving yourself at an ancient temple in Dragon's End could present an opportunity.

6137.name: Friend to Testudines
6137.requirement: Keep all the siege turtles alive during the assault on Fort Aspenwood.

6144.name: The Last of Their Kind
6144.requirement:
Listen to all of the exchanges between Aurene and Soo-Won in Dragon's End. 

Only one exchange can be heard for each time the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event is completed.

6152.name: A Sampling of Snargle
6152.description: "Art is meant to be shared, Kippo. How else can we build an audience for my work?"—Snargle Goldclaw
6152.requirement: Locate the various promotional samples of Snargle's works.

6376.name: Study of the Macabre
6376.description: When the stars are wrong, life cannot live.
6376.requirement: Find all evidence of incursions while searching Arborstone.

bits.text: Scattered bodies around crates of supplies.
Remains of an abandoned camp.
A group of diners who met a mysterious end.
Piles of straw arranged on the ground.
A strange and unidentifiable magical anomaly.
A cluster of dead refugees and travelers looking for the exit.
Journal of a lost tengu.
A journal tainted by some sort of strange energy.
A book laced with some sort of darkness.
A hastily scribbled note left behind.
A body...floating in the air.
A boat defying the laws of the universe.
A wooden target that appears to move on its own accord.
A letter sitting on top of a crate, unsent.

6545.name: Jumping the Nope Ropes
6545.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission without being hit by any of the boss's shock-wave attacks.

6578.name: Worldwide Dragon Basher
6578.requirement: Participate in the Hologram Stampede or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6704.name: Birthday—Year 12
6704.description: You have a character that is more than 12 years old.

6785.name: Connecting the Pieces
6785.requirement: Complete the story chapter Connecting the Pieces.

6805.name: The Twisted Marionette
6805.requirement: Complete the story chapter The Twisted Marionette.

6843.name: Seitung Province Skiff Racer: Silver
6843.requirement: Complete the Seitung Province Skiff Race with a silver rating or better.

6844.name: Black Lion Requisition Mission Week 4
6844.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help!
6844.requirement: Turn in materials with the Black Lion Requisition Officers at any major city during the event window.

6998.name: Bloodtide Coast Rift Hunting
6998.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Bloodtide Coast.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7095.name: Protector of the Rata Novus Promenade and Primal Maguuma
7095.description: You might get an honorary degree for this.
7095.requirement: Successfully complete events around the Rata Novus Promenade and Primal Maguuma.

bits.text: Help the Rata Novans prepare for a party. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony after preparing for a party. (Event 2 of 2)
Help the asuran researchers reach the source of abnormal energy. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the Kryptis after helping the asuran researchers. (Event 2 of 2)
Clear chak nests in the chak hatchery. (Event 1 of 2)
Collect chak energy and defend the battery. (Event 2 of 2)
Power Sentry L.O.X. with energy from the ley-line energy collectors.
Protect the injured Rift Hunters.
Burn grubs and insects with your skyscale. (Event 1 of 2)
Defeat the possessed gargantuan grub. (Event 2 of 2)
Defeat the champion stonehead.
Defeat the champion wyvern.

7131.name: Astral Ward Research
7131.description: Tomes and scrolls from every iteration of Tyria—the library of Amnytas is Isgarren's best kept secret.
7131.requirement: Read all the books in the Bastion of Knowledge library.

bits.text: "An Unofficial History of the Wizard's Court, Volume 2" by A. Hawthorn
"Strategic Scenario Response Proposal—Cold Frame—Astral Ward Eyes Only"
"Seer Curses and Rituals"
"On the Introduction of Sylvari to the Astral Ward"
"Archival Records: Legavo, The Binding of Wills"
"Strategic Scenario Response Proposal—Cardinal Blue—Astral Ward Eyes Only"
"Binding the Net of Sidereal"

7640.name: WvW Rush Tower Capturer
7640.requirement: Capture towers for your realm in World versus World.

7671.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Deep Falls
7671.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7788.name: Legendary Sigil Collector
7788.description: A true commander needs a sigil for every day of the week.
7788.requirement:
Bind  legendary sigil. 
(Players with existing legendary sigils can update this achievement when visiting Lion's Arch or the Wizard's Tower.)

7806.name: A Record of War: The Natural
7806.requirement: Complete various tasks throughout Nayos and earn the banner of the Bastion of the Natural.

bits.text: Speak with Researcher Lanni to learn about the flora and fauna of Nayos.
Read the memory left by the Kryptis.
Destroy the hazardous nests in Nayos.

7844.name: A Gust of Clean Air
7844.requirement: Help Scipio get rid of the hazardous nests above the forward bivouac.

7866.name: Reconquer the Hidden Depths (Weekly)
7866.requirement: Collect key fragments from lesser nightmare pods, and unlock the greater nightmare pod while the Hidden Depths is dark.

7995.name: Nayos Recon Run: Silver
7995.requirement:
Earn a silver medal or better in the Nayos Recon Run adventure.

(This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure. Progress will update when you claim the rewards.)

8004.name: Thornsprout Boom!
8004.description: Seems Leadclaw has a green thumb.
8004.requirement: Refuse to heed Gharr's warning about staying out of his cabbages.

8010.name: Talk of the Tower
8010.requirement: Check in with all your friends and allies in the Wizard's Tower.

bits.text: 2. Check in with Dagda.
3. Check in with Frode.
4. Check in with Livia.
5. Check in with Lyhr.
17. Check on the high-diving Kryptis.
6. Check in with Narcisse.
7. Check in with R'tchikk.
18. Converse with the Astral Ward instructor.
19. Converse with the group painting.
8. Check in with Uenno.
9. Check in with Zizel.
16. Speak with Zojja.
1. Check in with Arina.
10. Speak with Galrath.
11. Speak with Isgarren.
12. Speak with General Nephus
13. Speak with Peitha.
14. Speak with Ramses.
15. Speak with General Zantharon.
20. Overhear Corporal Balkin and Corporal Kiona's conversation.

8027.name: Stormbluff Isle Veteran
8027.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8097.name: A Sign of Respect
8097.requirement: Salute when members of the Astral Ward bow to you.

8099.name: Amnytas Supply Run: Gold
8099.description: Though many use a skyscale for this, there are some skilled griffon fliers that flap their way to first.
8099.requirement:
Earn a gold medal in the Amnytas Supply Run adventure.

(Progress will update when you claim the rewards from this adventure.)

8252.name: (Repeatable) Lowland Shore: Harvest Den Renown Heart
8252.requirement: Successfully complete the Harvest Den Renown Heart on  unique days.

8266.name: Gettin' the Crew Together
8266.description: An untested potion, a cat with a mission, the wilds of Janthir...what could go wrong?
8266.requirement: Fully test Zizel's potion on a variety of animals.

bits.text: Read the letter from Zizel.
Find Zizel in Moon Camp.
Find the cat Zizel mentioned. They are hiding in Moon Camp.
Report back to Zizel about your first test of the potion.
Find Ms. Jeeves in Harvest Den.
Ms. Jeeves needs someone with excellent swimming skills to join the crew.
Ms. Jeeves needs someone who can produce a loud croak as a distraction.
Ms. Jeeves needs someone small, with a good nose and great jumping skills.
Ms. Jeeves needs someone with excellent hearing and night vision, as well as a loud howl.
Ms. Jeeves needs a hardworking sort, used to large groups and sticky situations.
Ms. Jeeves needs an aerial fighter who is not afraid of a little blood.
Check back in with Ms. Jeeves to get your next instructions.
Find Mr. Ribbington in Janthir Syntri.
Mr. Ribbington needs a group of animals that can get into small spaces.
Mr. Ribbington needs someone with a couple of pincers to blend in with a cast.
Mr. Ribbington needs someone who is a strong swimmer—preferably large—with a nasty bite.
You've found all the animals Mr. Ribbington needs. Check back in with him.
You've found all of the animals. Report to Ms. Jeeves.
Ms. Jeeves is going to address the gathered crew in the cave where you found Mrs. Night.
The heist is on! It's time to report to Zizel about your findings.

8288.name: The Queen's Gambit
8288.description: The queen slumbers beneath the peat, waiting...

8294.name: Troll Delicacy
8294.requirement: Consume a rock cooked by the troll.

8320.name: (Repeatable) Janthir Syntri: Stricken Plains Renown Heart
8320.description: You're why the bearkin can rest at ease.
8320.requirement: Successfully complete the Stricken Plains Renown Heart on  unique days.

8526.name: Revenge of the Icebrood Construct (Weekly)
8526.requirement: Participate in the successful completion of Storms of Winter in Bjora Marches.

8554.name: Mistburned Barrens Fisher
8554.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
8554.requirement: Collect  different fish from the lakes and ponds in Mistburned Barrens.

8647.name: Taking a Cat's Coin
8647.requirement: Earn profits from a café in your homestead.
